an3.50:1.1: Bodhi hat „betreibt Bandenunwesen“ für _ekāgārika_, aber vgl. MW: „_aikāgārika_ as, ī mf. (fr. _ekâgāra_ • _ekam asahāyam āgāram prayojanam asya_, whose object is a solitary house), a thief Pāṇ. 5-1, 113 Daś. Śiś.; which agrees with pali comms ‚_ekam eva gharaṁ parivāretvā vilumpanaṁ_‘“, siehe CPD. (Sujato)
